head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DILLON, MARION MCNULTY,

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DILLON, MARION MCNULTY,

block.p: DILLON-Marion McNulty, in Cape Elizabeth, Maine, on July 1, 2000 of Old Ocean House Road. Formerly of Buffalo, New York. Widow of Robert E. Dillon. Beloved mother of Robert E. Dillon, Jr. of Westfield, NJ and James McN. Dillon of Calistoga, CA, sister of Harriet M. Adsit of Lake Wales, FL. Funeral mass 10:00 AM Thursday at St. Bartholomew Church, Cape Elizabeth, Maine. Visitation 2 to 4 & 7 to 9 PM Wednesday at The Conroy-Tully South Portland Chapel, 1024 Broadway, South Portland, Maine. Donation in lieu of flowers, Buffalo Seminary, Bidwell Parkway, Buffalo, New York 14209.
